column4: wtc? I didn't realise there were still webmasters incompetent enough to list a system requirements on the front of their website: http://www.anytimeworld.com/landing.htm gaah!
If I owned I shop I wouldn't want a sales assistent that said "fuck off" to one in every ten people that walks in the door..
that must be the most clueless site i've seen in a while :)
